title: Add a random full cluster restart to ChaosMonkey tests.
description: We can't yet easily keep sending updates during the restart until we have the ability to say how many replicas the update must reach to be successful, but we can easily stop updates, do a full cluster restart and then start updates again.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: Here is a rough patch I put together last night. There are some things to address it appears.
